text: "The Hang of It" is a short story by J. D. Salinger, first published in the July 12, 1941 issue of Collier's magazine. It is a commercial tale of a soldier who just can't seem to get "The Hang of It". It was reprinted in the 1942 and 1943 editions of the Kit Book for Soldiers, Sailors, and Marines by Consolidated Book Publishers, Inc. == References == Category:1941 short stories Category:Short stories by J. D. Salinger Category:Works originally published in Collier's
title: The Hang of It
